      • JetAPIOrder

        public JetAPIOrder(APIHttpClient client,
                   JetConfig conf,
                   boolean lockHost,
                   long maxDownloadSize)
        Create a new API instance
        Parameters:
        client - The built APIHttpClient instance
        conf - The Jet Configuration object
        lockHost - Toggle locking the host to a domain if http is not present in the url string.
        maxDownloadSize - Set a maximum download site for the local client. This is a fixed limit.

        Parameters:

        includePath - If this is false, only the rightmost path part is returned from the uri.
        Returns:
        token list
        Throws:
        APIException

      • sendPutAckOrder

        public JetAPIResponse sendPutAckOrder(String jetOrderId,
                                      AckRequestRec req)
                               throws APIException,
                                      JetException
        The order acknowledge call is utilized to allow a retailer to accept or reject an order. If there are any skus in the order that cannot be fulfilled then you will reject the order.
        Parameters:
        jetOrderId - Jet-defined order id
        req - The acknowledgement request to reply to jet with
        Returns:
        api response
        Throws:
        APIException
        JetException

      • sendPutShipOrder

        public JetAPIResponse sendPutShipOrder(String jetOrderId,
                                       ShipRequestRec req)
                                throws APIException,
                                       JetException
        The order shipped call is utilized to provide Jet with the SKUs that have been shipped or cancelled in an order, the tracking information, carrier information and any additional returns information for the order.
        Parameters:
        jetOrderId - Jet-defined order id
        req - shipment request
        Returns:
        api response
        Throws:
        APIException
        JetException
